topic: Workout635 opened up its first workout center, which was founded by Richard Samson
Richard Samson opened up Workout635 centers in 2 states
Workout635 obtained an average of 200 customers daily
Richard Samson was awarded with the Virginia Gym of The Year reward
Workout635 opened up workout centers in all US States
Richard Samson stepped down and John Turner became president of Workout635
John Turner opened up their first three Workout635 centers in Europe
John Turner received the Best Gym of The Year reward
